taxon.distribution: North America, Europe, Russia (Europe to Far East), China, Mongolia, Japan

referenceObject.reference: Pickard-Cambridge, O. (1863). Description of twenty-four new species of spiders lately discoverd in Dorsetshire and Hampshire; together with a list of rare and some other hitherto unrecorded British spiders. Zoologist 21: 8561-8599.
